# ghost_theme (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "ghost_theme" "theme" {
  name     = "my-theme"
  activate = true
  source   = "my-theme.zip"
  hash     = filesha256("my-theme.zip")
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `hash` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `source` (String)

### Optional

- `activate` (Boolean)
